description.p: Defines how long an event should be locked when the Temporarily lock event handlers to prevent duplicate events property is enabled.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Lock duration (ms)]* defines the length of time in milliseconds to wait before allowing another *[ui:Javascript - (Touch, Mouse, Pointer Events)]* event to fire. The lock duration defaults to *[300]*.
This property is only shown when *[ui:Temporarily lock event handlers to prevent duplicate events]* has been checked.

see.ref: Temporarily lock event handlers to prevent duplicate events
